refnamediv.refpurpose: Edit LDB databases using your favorite editor

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ldbedit is a utility that allows you to edit LDB files using your favorite editor. ldbedit generates an LDIF file based on your query, allows you to edit it and then merges it back into the LDB database.

listitem.para: LDB URL to connect to. See ldb(7) for details.
Search scope to use. One-level, subtree or base.
Specify the editor that should be used (overrides the VISUAL and EDITOR environment variables).
LDB URL to connect to (can be overrided by using the -H command-line option.)
Environment variables used to determine what editor to use. If VISUAL isn't set, EDITOR is used.
